text.__SUMMARY__: Gymnopilus rufosquamulosus is a species of mushroom in the Cortinariaceae family.
text.Description:
The cap is 0.6 to 5 centimetres (0.2 to 2.0 in) in diameter.
Microscopic characteristics
text.Habitat and distribution: Gymnopilus rufosquamulosus has been found growing on oak trees, in Texas during August.
